text: @DavidJUrban @realDonaldTrump @HillaryClinton @JoeBiden America in April 2020 have had the cleanest skies for years. The cleanest since Trump and he had everything to do with it. Covid-19 forced him  and the states to close fossil fuel industries down. Only Trump and the GOP are trying to bail them out and restart them ASAP
